evidence.claim: HealthPact utilizes AWS cloud services for hosting and data management.
The company follows HIPAA compliance for handling patient data securely.
HealthPact supports FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
Integration with various EHR systems is achieved through standardized transaction sets like X12.
Utilization of Azure for enhanced data analytics capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: Company operates with X12 and API integration, indicating alignment with target ICP.
